title: Productivity is people
creator_credit: Suzanne Baker, Film Australia and Michael Robertson
brief_description: A case-study in management - employee relations based on the concept of a productivity improvement team. In the course of the film the team members express their personal views on advantages of the concept.
creator_credit_for_label: Suzanne Baker, Film Australia and Michael Robertson
